title: The Haunting of Charley Doe
description: Can a man with no recollection of who he is and a woman with a dark past create a future together?Charlie witnessed a terrible thing when he was a kid and he spent the rest of his life blaming himself for it, that is until he had a near fatal accident while hiking in Colorado. As a result of a 200 foot fall Charlie has broken almost every bone in his body lacerated his face beyond recognition and suffered complete amnesia. In attempting to discover his identity Charlie may be faced with confronting that one event that he cant forgive himself for. Along his journey to discover who he is he ends up falling in love with his Doctor.Dr. Annie Sexton does her best to help Charlie uncover his past but in the process she is forced to confront her own dark past. Annie ends up stirring up something would have been better being left alone. But she has fallen for Charlie and she needs to fix this one thing before she can begin a life with him.Can they survive their pasts to create a future together?
author: Al Shulver
